data.title: California Extra Virgin Olive Oil & More
data.meta_description: Explore the world of exquisite Extra Virgin Olive Oil at Olive This Olive That. Discover one of the best-tasting EVOO, unique infused olive oils, balsamic & fruit vinegar, salts and seasoning, pasta, gift ideas and gourmet pantry essentials. High quality, exceptional taste - Order yours today!
data.text:
Patrick Z. of Concord, CA

from YELP

This place exceeded my expectations. I didn't know what to expect, but I sure was wow'd. The staff was great. They gave me some bread cubes to use for tasting the olive and vinegar. They were helpful when asked questions. I ended up buying four bottlesâ€¦ (SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Paul B. of Indio, CA

From YELP

"The greatest little shop for olive oil and vinegars and pasta and cool kitchen ware. You have to see this place!!

Janell is the greatest personality running this place and have an online presents."

(SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Alicia DiGiammarino

From GOOGLE REVIEWS

I highly recommend booking a private tasting here for your next team building event. To accompany the five oils we tasted, Janell created a gorgeous spread of fresh produce with gourmet cheeses, salami and chocolate. The aroma of the first oil was so del...(SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Mira Jones

From GOOGLE REVIEWS

High quality olive oils and lots of other tasty, well curated goodies. The owner is committed to featuring local products by diverse makers, so you can find some nice treats that support cool local producers. (SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

AliceAnn Allen Wilson

From FACEBOOK REVIEWS

I visited Olive This Olive That in the spring and went home (Kansas City) with some small bottles of oil and vinegar. I was back in San Francisco recently and made sure I returned to get bigger bottles of what I had bought earlier. Their oils and vinegar are...(SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Stephanie Thoma

From FACEBOOK REVIEWS

I love the wide variety of creative flavors and pairings of olive oil for salads, fish, and desserts. The Meyer lemon and dark cherry are my favorites! It's in such a great nook on Vickburg street and always so fun to visit. (SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Dani B. of San Francisco, CA

From TRIPADVISOR

What a local shop should be - Olive oil, soaps, pasta, candles -- Everything you could get in a large grocery store or on line. Olive This Olive That "gets" why small, local business matters. They're always warm and inviting. They give back...(SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)

Jill A A of San Francisco, CA

From TRIPADVISOR

The Best Freshest Flavorful Olive Oil & Vinegars - Great Experience! My family loves this shop! Their extra virgin olive oils are fresh, local, flavorful and their infused olive oils and balsamic vinegars are out of this world. The very helpful and...(SEE FULL TESTIMONIALS HERE)
